title: Do not support Nvidia Gameworks enabled games.
body:
In an effort of Nvidia trying to manipulate the industry, they are killing PC gaming even for themselves.

Let me just some of the "amazing" performance games that Gameworks provides:
Assassin's Creed Unity
WATCH_DOGS
Call of Duty: Ghosts
Assassin's Creed IV: Blackflag
Batman Arkham Origins


For people who don't know what Gameworks is. It is an SDK to add effects or rending technologies to "optimize" for Nvidia based GPUs, without having to properly add effects themselves like HBAO+. If this technology worked as Nvidia intended, it would only strangle AMD cards into resulting into poor performance. 

The reality however, is in their effort to cheat their way out of producing better products (Like Intel and their compiler)... they actually fuck everybody over. There has not been a single Nvidia Gameworks game to date that has performed properly.  Just look at AW compared to Ghosts, the game runs on the same engine, but one is Gameworks enabled and one is not. Can you guess which one?
http://i.imgur.com/gHSO9qP.png
http://i.imgur.com/QOxbSjf.png
http://i.imgur.com/2VWii0x.png

Please do not buy Gameworks enabled games, as it is poor practice for both GPU manufacturers and Game Developers.
